items.title: Why Fed chief Powell's rate cut signal lifted our non-tech stocks the most
items.description: Remarks from Fed Chairman Jerome Powell sparked a broad stock market rally on hopes of an interest rate cut sooner than later.

items.title: This under-the-radar ETF trend may be flashing a warning signal for the market
items.description: Massive inflows into pockets of the ETF market may be approaching their peak, setting up for a pandemic-like correction, one expert warns.

items.title: Powell indicates conditions 'may warrant' interest rate cuts as Fed proceeds 'carefully'
items.description: Powell on Friday gave a tepid indication of possible cuts ahead as he noted a high level of uncertainty.

items.title: Here's what current and former Fed officials are saying about Lisa Cook investigation
items.description: Multiple current and former Fed officials are speaking up as Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook faces attacks from the Trump administration.

items.title: Cleveland Fed's Hammack casts doubt on interest rate cuts amid inflation worries
items.description: In a CNBC interview, the policymaker did not share the market's enthusiasm for a cut.
